#summary Links to papers, related pages and other projects

=== Other Particle Systems ===

http://particlesystems.org
    An open source particle engine and API written in C++. A strong source or ideas and inspiration. Lepton [Domain]s in particular are inspired by this project.

[http://jops.softmed.org/ Java Open Particle System]
  An open source particle engine for Java. Has a nice GUI for creating particle effect.s

http://www.wondertouch.com/
  A very nice looking commercial particle engine. Nice examples to draw inspiration from.
